item.title: BO - Advanced Parameters - Experimental Features - Enable/Disabled PPV2
item.description: BO - Advanced Parameters - Experimental Features - Enable/Disabled PPV2 Details Component : Core Status : Closed Automated on : 8.0.x, 8.1.x, 9.0.x Scenario : https://forge.prestashop.com/browse/TEST-2155 Steps Step Description Expected result Go to BO > Advanced Parameters > New & Experimental Features page The New & Experimental Features page is displayed and the button “New product page - Single store” is disabled by default Enable the “New product page - Single store” > Save and confirm the activation An alert “Update successful” is displayed Go to BO > Catalog > Products page The Button “New product” is displayed Click on “New product” A selection of different types of product should be displayed Go to BO > Advanced Parameters > New & Experimental Features page The Experimental Features page is displayed and the button “Experimental product page” is enabled Disable the “Experimental product page” > Save > Confirm the deactivation An alert “Update successful” is displayed Go to BO > Catalog > Products page > Click on “New Product” The product page v1 should be displayed
